content.text: The Still is a machine capable of refining Biomass into Ethanol, at a 10:3 ratio (for every 10 Biomass buckets processed you get 3 Ethanol buckets).
If you have Buildcraft installed, you can do the same process in a Refinery, for a 4:1 ratio.
Ethanol can then be used in the Bio Generator for generating EU for IndustrialCraft² machines, or as fuel for Buildcraft's Combustion Engine. It cannot be used as a fuel for the Biogas Engine!
This means that this machine probably won't be very useful to you if you don't have Buildcraft or IndustrialCraft² installed.
